#summary Describe OSE MySQL database to power objectsearch web applications.

= Introduction =

OSE uses MySQL DB to store the following data:
  * Object domain specs
  * Web pages Annotation (Tags)
  * Training related data (model, weights, ...)

= Details =

  # Import MySQL Schema in 
/trunk/core/annieDB/schema/mysql_schema.sql

  # Run the following queries to load data
